name: Kanjozokuレーサ Racing Car Games
description:
Explore an amazing world of racing bay acquiring new legendary cars and by completing fun challenges!It is in your best interest to climb the racers ladder up and reach top 1! You are in change of the transmission, you are the real racer everybody is afraid to complete against!
Features:
-90s Osaka Kanjo Illegal street racing.
-Feel like a street racer and drive on Japanese autobahns.
-True 90s and 2000s JDM Cars to drive and tune.
-Engine Tuning: Internals, Turbochargers, ECU, Fuel, Intake, Exhaust, etc.
-Engine Swaps: 2JZ, RB26, VQ35, 4AGE, B16B, 13B, LS3, SR20, CA18, and much more!
-Body Tuning: Bumpers, Hoods, Fenders, Lights, etc.
-Suspension Tuning: Wheels, Rims, Tires, Camber, Coilovers, Spacers etc.
-Load custom vinyls/liveries to the car.
-Online Races: Time Attack, Minimum Speed, do not crash, Avoid Traffic, etc.
-Online Car Meets and Hotspots.
-Drift with RWD and AWD cars.
-High Speed Police Chases.
-Rating system: Avoid traffic at high speeds, complete races, escape police chases, play online and PvP with someone else to gain more rating.


Terms and Conditions: https://midnight.games/terms/
